code:
# @param {Integer[]} nums1
# @param {Integer[]} nums2
# @return {Integer}
def min_sum(nums1, nums2)
  sum1, sum2 = nums1.sum, nums2.sum
  zero_count1, zero_count2 = nums1.count(0), nums2.count(0)
  diff = (sum1 - sum2).abs

  if zero_count1 + zero_count2 == 0
    return sum1 == sum2 ? sum1 : -1
  end

  base_sum = [sum1, sum2].max
  total_zeros = zero_count1 + zero_count2

  if sum1 == sum2
    return base_sum + total_zeros
  elsif sum1 < sum2
    needed = sum2 - sum1
    return needed + sum2 if zero_count1 >= needed
  else
    needed = sum1 - sum2
    return needed + sum1 if zero_count2 >= needed
  end

  -1
end
